AI_QUALITY_FAILURES.reasoning: ATLAS provides generic, templated guidance (requesting uploads) without any issue-specific troubleshooting or analysis, and the chat transcript is largely filler rather than actionable steps for the reported performance/disk-full recurrence.
evidence: "Please select from the below or give me a detailed description of what’s happening. Any error messages you’ve seen or steps you’ve already tried would be really helpful."
"If you have any 📃 log files or 🖼️ screenshots to upload to help with the troubleshooting, now is the time to do it 💪"
"Getting the most out of GFI Exinda ATLAS Support Chat" (link-only guidance)

AI_WALL_LOOPING.reasoning: The AI interaction is short and mainly results in a ticket being created; there is no clear loop of repeated AI requests or customer frustration about being unable to reach a human.

IGNORING_CONTEXT.reasoning: Support does not fully engage with key context the customer repeatedly highlights (recurrence after following the prior KB and that diagnostic/snapshot files are being auto-generated), initially responding with deletion advice rather than addressing the root cause question of why files keep regenerating.
evidence: "We raised a ticket earlier and they provided us with an article. We have followed the same but the issue reoccurs and persists."
"Able to see many diagnostic files auto created, not sure how and why. Are they crash logs?"
"We can see that the multiple diagnostic & snapshot files are automatically getting generated. ... Please let us know if we can have a Webex to check further."
"Thank you for providing the logs. You can delete all of the diagnostic files that appear in your screenshot."

RESPONSE_DELAYS.reasoning: There are multiple customer follow-ups after multi-day gaps with no support response, and support explicitly apologizes for the delay.
evidence: Customer: "Please provide us with the shell license key to execute these commands." [2025-10-23T08:30:51+00:00] vs Support key provided [2025-10-27T13:59:45+00:00]
"Please any update here? Can you provide the below request ASAP." [2025-10-26T12:35:40+00:00]

"I sincerely apologize for the delayed response on this ticket." [2025-11-04T11:35:20+00:00]

PREMATURE_CLOSURE.reasoning: Although there are auto-messages warning the ticket may close after a week, the transcript does not show the ticket actually being closed while the customer is awaiting action; support ultimately conducts a meeting and provides next steps.
evidence: "This ticket will stay open for one week unless you reply with \"This ticket can be closed\" or update the status to Completed in the portal."

P1_SEV1_MISHANDLING.reasoning: The issue is presented as urgent/critical (disk full + performance degradation, recurring) with explicit urgency from stakeholders, yet there are multi-day delays and a slow path to real-time escalation (WebEx) and deeper investigation.
evidence: "Exinda Network Orchestrator Performance Issue and the disk space is full."
"We have followed the same but the issue reoccurs and persists."
"We are at critical stage and must expediate all the tasks and activities"
Multi-day gap before providing required "shell license key" and multi-day delay to schedule the requested Webex
